leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 生信-组学整合与知识图谱生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 对齐→融合→推理→检索→证据链→评测

unit.unit_name: 实体识别/规范化/本体映射

queries: [WEB] biomedical named entity recognition tools github
[WEB] gene protein id mapping tools github

tools.name: NER-RE Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Spacy-based pipeline for Named Entity Recognition, Linking, and Relation Extraction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive NLP pipeline built on Spacy v3 that performs Named Entity Recognition (NER), Entity Linking to a Knowledge Base, and Relation Extraction. It is designed to extract entities, normalize them, and identify relationships within text.

tools.name: OntoMerger
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology alignment library for deduplicating knowledge graph nodes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by AstraZeneca for ontology alignment and knowledge graph deduplication. It helps in merging overlapping concepts from different ontologies into a unified hierarchy, essential for maintaining clean biological knowledge graphs.

tools.name: argNorm
tools.one_line_profile: Antibiotic Resistance Gene (ARG) normalization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to normalize Antibiotic Resistance Genes (ARGs) by mapping them to the Antibiotic Resistance Ontology (ARO). It supports outputs from various ARG prediction tools like DeepARG, ARGs-OAP, and Abricate.

tools.name: MedCAT
tools.one_line_profile: Medical Concept Annotation Tool for biomedical text
tools.detailed_description: A highly efficient Natural Language Processing tool for extracting, linking, and normalizing medical concepts from Electronic Health Records (EHRs) and biomedical text. It uses unsupervised learning to build concept databases and performs Named Entity Recognition and Linking (NER+L).

tools.name: MedCATtrainer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive interface for training and improving MedCAT models
tools.detailed_description: A web-based interface designed to inspect, improve, and add concepts to MedCAT models. It allows for active learning and manual annotation to create high-quality training datasets for biomedical Named Entity Recognition and Linking.

tools.name: CogStack NLP
tools.one_line_profile: NLP pipeline and platform for clinical data analysis
tools.detailed_description: The core NLP component of the CogStack platform, designed to process and analyze unstructured clinical data. It integrates tools like MedCAT to enable information extraction and enterprise-level clinical search and analytics.

tools.name: OXO
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology cross-reference and mapping service
tools.detailed_description: A service provided by EMBL-EBI for finding mappings (cross-references) between terms from different ontologies, vocabularies, and coding standards. It allows users to traverse the network of ontology mappings.

tools.name: OntoString
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for curating mappings from free text to ontology terms
tools.detailed_description: A curation tool developed by EMBL-EBI to assist in mapping free text descriptions to ontology terms, facilitating the standardization of biomedical data.

tools.name: ZOOMA
tools.one_line_profile: Optimal Ontology Mapping Application
tools.detailed_description: A service for automatically mapping free text annotations to ontology terms based on curated knowledge bases. Developed by EMBL-EBI, it helps in harmonizing biological data by predicting ontology codes for text descriptions.

tools.name: Bio-YODIE
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical named entity linking pipeline for GATE
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical Named Entity Linking (NEL) pipeline built on the GATE framework. It links entities in biomedical text to the UMLS (Unified Medical Language System) concepts, handling disambiguation and normalization.

tools.name: AGATHA
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic Graph-mining And Transformer based Hypothesis generation Approach
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning system for hypothesis generation in biomedical knowledge graphs. It uses transformers and graph mining techniques to predict plausible connections and generate new scientific hypotheses from existing literature and data.

tools.name: CTakesParser.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package to parse Apache cTAKES output
tools.detailed_description: A utility library in Julia for parsing the XMI output generated by Apache cTAKES. It facilitates the integration of clinical text analysis results into Julia-based data analysis workflows.

tools.name: BERTMap
tools.one_line_profile: BERT-based ontology alignment system
tools.detailed_description: A system that utilizes BERT (Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers) to perform ontology alignment. It leverages the semantic understanding of language models to match concepts across different ontologies.

tools.name: GeoSpatial-UNET
tools.one_line_profile: Vector map generation from aerial imagery using U-Net
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool based on U-Net architecture for extracting building footprints and generating vector maps from aerial or satellite imagery. It includes batch normalization enhancements for better segmentation performance.

tools.name: medaCy
tools.one_line_profile: Medical text mining and information extraction framework
tools.detailed_description: A medical text mining and information extraction library built on top of spaCy. It provides tools for training and deploying NER models specifically for clinical and biomedical text.

tools.name: UMLS-KG
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to build and query a Knowledge Graph from UMLS
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolset to construct a Knowledge Graph from UMLS (Unified Medical Language System) sources, load it into Neo4j, and perform queries and visualization. It integrates Scispacy for text processing.

tools.name: polymerNEN
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Normalization for polymers
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool for normalizing polymer named entities in materials science text. Developed by the Ramprasad Group, it maps diverse polymer names to standardized canonical forms.

tools.name: PALADIN
tools.one_line_profile: Protein alignment and detection interface for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: PALADIN is a protein sequence alignment tool designed for the accurate and efficient detection of proteins in metagenomic shotgun sequencing data. It maps nucleotide reads to protein references.

tools.name: OntoEmma
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology matcher for matching entities between knowledge bases
tools.detailed_description: OntoEmma is a tool for matching entities between two ontologies or knowledge bases. It uses a neural network architecture to learn similarities between entities.

tools.name: scispacy
tools.one_line_profile: SpaCy pipeline and models for scientific/biomedical documents
tools.detailed_description: scispacy is a Python package containing spaCy pipelines and models for processing biomedical, scientific or clinical text, including features for NER and entity linking.

tools.name: Apache cTAKES
tools.one_line_profile: Natural Language Processing platform for clinical text
tools.detailed_description: Apache cTAKES (clinical Text Analysis and Knowledge Extraction System) is an NLP system for extracting information from electronic medical record clinical free-text.

tools.name: Map-On
tools.one_line_profile: Visual ontology mapping editor for R2RML documents
tools.detailed_description: Map-On is a web-based visual environment for ontology mapping, specifically designed to facilitate the creation of R2RML mappings for integrating data into knowledge graphs.

tools.name: RGI
tools.one_line_profile: Resistance Gene Identifier for predicting resistomes
tools.detailed_description: The Resistance Gene Identifier (RGI) is software to predict resistomes from protein or nucleotide data based on homology and SNP models, often used with the CARD database.

tools.name: BridgeDb
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for identifier mapping in bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: BridgeDb is a framework and library for mapping identifiers between various biological databases (e.g., genes, proteins, metabolites) to support data integration.

tools.name: OMOP2OBO
tools.one_line_profile: Library for mapping OMOP terminologies to Open Biomedical Ontologies
tools.detailed_description: OMOP2OBO is a Python library designed to map OMOP standardized clinical terminologies to Open Biomedical Ontologies (OBO), facilitating interoperability between clinical and biomedical data.

tools.name: SapBERT
tools.one_line_profile: Self-alignment pretraining for biomedical entity linking
tools.detailed_description: SapBERT is a pretraining framework and model for biomedical entity linking, designed to align the representation space of biomedical entities using synonymy information.

tools.name: ontology-mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mapping free-text descriptions to ontology terms
tools.detailed_description: ontology-mapper is a tool developed by HMS for mapping free-text descriptions of entities to standard ontology terms, supporting data harmonization.

tools.name: Prancer
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for rapid annotation for clinical entity recognition
tools.detailed_description: Prancer is a platform designed to enable rapid annotation for clinical entity recognition, facilitating the creation of training data for NLP models.

tools.name: DBpedia Mappings Autogeneration
tools.one_line_profile: Tools to infer Wikipedia infobox to ontology mappings for DBpedia
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and tools designed to automatically generate and infer mappings between Wikipedia infobox attributes and the DBpedia ontology, facilitating knowledge graph construction.

tools.name: Wikidata Mapper
tools.one_line_profile: Automated tool for mapping Wikidata entities to DBpedia ontology
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed for the automated generation of mappings from Wikidata properties and classes to the DBpedia ontology, supporting knowledge graph alignment.

tools.name: ckblib
tools.one_line_profile: Library for creating clinical knowledge graphs from biomedical literature
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that integrates NCBI Eutils, cTAKES annotators, and Neo4J to extract clinical information from literature and construct knowledge graphs.

tools.name: gficf
tools.one_line_profile: Gene Frequency - Inverse Cell Frequency normalization for single cell data
tools.detailed_description: An R implementation (via C++) of the TF-IDF analogous normalization method specifically designed for single-cell gene expression data.

tools.name: ANGEL
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical generative entity linking with negative sampling
tools.detailed_description: A tool for biomedical entity linking that employs a generative approach and learns from negative samples to improve disambiguation accuracy.

tools.name: BERN2
tools.one_line_profile: Advanced neural biomedical named entity recognition and normalization tool
tools.detailed_description: A state-of-the-art neural tool for recognizing and normalizing various biomedical entities (genes, diseases, chemicals, etc.) from text.

tools.name: BioSyn
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical entity representations with synonym marginalization
tools.detailed_description: A model and tool for biomedical entity normalization that leverages synonym marginalization to learn robust entity representations.

tools.name: KAZU-NER-module
tools.one_line_profile: Biomedical NER module integrating BERN2 and Kazu framework
tools.detailed_description: A component for enterprise-grade biomedical named entity recognition, distilling the capabilities of BERN2 within the Kazu framework.

tools.name: BERN
tools.one_line_profile: Neural named entity recognition and multi-type normalization tool
tools.detailed_description: A neural network-based tool for biomedical named entity recognition and normalization, capable of handling multiple entity types.

tools.name: Generate-and-Rank-ConNorm
tools.one_line_profile: Generate-and-Rank framework for biomedical concept normalization
tools.detailed_description: A framework utilizing semantic type regularization to perform biomedical concept normalization through a generate-and-rank approach.

tools.name: EDAMmap
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for mapping text input to EDAM ontology concepts
tools.detailed_description: A utility to map various textual inputs to concepts within the EDAM ontology, useful for annotating bioinformatics resources.

tools.name: BridgeDbR
tools.one_line_profile: R package interface for BridgeDb identifier mapping framework
tools.detailed_description: The Bioconductor R package that provides an interface to the BridgeDb framework for mapping identifiers between various biological databases.

tools.name: create-bridgedb-metabolites
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to create BridgeDb mapping files for metabolites
tools.detailed_description: A utility to generate BridgeDb identity mapping databases specifically for metabolites, aggregating data from HMDB, ChEBI, and Wikidata.

tools.name: LogMap Matcher
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable ontology alignment and repair system
tools.detailed_description: A highly scalable system for ontology alignment (matching) and alignment repair, capable of handling large biomedical ontologies.

tools.name: RNAnorm
tools.one_line_profile: Normalization library for RNA-seq gene expression data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing standard normalization methods (TPM, CPM, etc.) for RNA-seq gene expression data.

tools.name: cTAKES Clinical Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Engine for executing clinical NLP pipelines using Apache cTAKES
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline engine designed to facilitate the configuration and execution of Apache cTAKES clinical text processing workflows.

tools.name: PubTator Tools
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities to retrieve and process PubTator annotations
tools.detailed_description: A set of scripts and tools to access, download, and process biomedical text annotations from the PubTator service.

tools.name: Gilda
tools.one_line_profile: Grounding of biomedical named entities with contextual disambiguation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and service for normalizing (grounding) biomedical named entities to knowledge bases, featuring context-aware disambiguation.

tools.name: xMEN
tools.one_line_profile: Modular toolkit for cross-lingual medical entity normalization
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolkit designed for normalizing medical entities across different languages, supporting various knowledge bases.

tools.name: HUNER
tools.one_line_profile: Named Entity Recognition tool for biomedical entities
tools.detailed_description: A tool focused on biomedical named entity recognition, providing models and inference capabilities for extracting entities from text.

tools.name: Drug ID Mapping
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for cross-matching drug identifiers across multiple databases
tools.detailed_description: A utility to map and unify drug identifiers from databases like DrugBank, ChEMBL, PubChem, and UMLS into a structured format.

tools.name: UPIMAPI
tools.one_line_profile: UniProt ID mapping tool via API
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool to perform identifier mapping using the UniProt API, supporting batch processing and various cross-references.

tools.name: OntologyRAG
tools.one_line_profile: Retrieval-Augmented Generation for biomedical code mapping
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging RAG and Large Language Models to improve the accuracy and speed of mapping biomedical text to ontology codes.

tools.name: biotext
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to download and chunk biomedical literature
tools.detailed_description: A utility for downloading, processing, and chunking large collections of biomedical literature (like PubMed/PMC) for local analysis.

tools.name: clinspacy
tools.one_line_profile: Clinical Natural Language Processing wrapper for spaCy in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package that performs clinical natural language processing (NLP) by wrapping spaCy, scispacy, and medspacy, enabling entity recognition and normalization in clinical text.

tools.name: AIONER
tools.one_line_profile: All-in-One Named Entity Recognition tool by NCBI
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical named entity recognition tool developed by NCBI, designed to identify various biomedical entities in text.

tools.name: semantic-bot
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-automatic tool for generating RDF mappings
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to assist in generating RDF mappings for datasets, facilitating the semantic enrichment of data.

tools.name: mapping-master
tools.one_line_profile: DSL library for mapping spreadsheets to OWL ontologies
tools.detailed_description: A library supporting the Mapping Master DSL, allowing users to map content from spreadsheets to OWL ontologies, part of the Protégé ecosystem.

tools.name: ChemSpot
tools.one_line_profile: Named entity recognition tool for chemicals
tools.detailed_description: A named entity recognition tool for identifying mentions of chemicals in natural language texts, including drugs, abbreviations, and molecular formulas.

tools.name: geniatagger
tools.one_line_profile: POS tagging and NER tool for biomedical text
tools.detailed_description: A tool for part-of-speech tagging, shallow parsing, and named entity recognition specifically designed for biomedical text.

tools.name: OntoAligner
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolkit for ontology alignment
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit designed to facilitate ontology alignment tasks, providing utilities for matching and mapping between different ontologies.

tools.name: MedType
tools.one_line_profile: Medical entity linking tool with semantic type prediction
tools.detailed_description: A biomedical entity linking framework that improves accuracy by predicting the semantic type of entities before linking them to the knowledge base, specifically targeting the UMLS metathesaurus.

tools.name: OHDSI Ananke
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping tool for OHDSI and UMLS identifiers
tools.detailed_description: An R package developed to facilitate the mapping and alignment between OHDSI Concept Identifiers and Unified Medical Language System (UMLS) identifiers, supporting interoperability in observational health data.

tools.name: Biomedical-Entity-Linking (AAAI21)
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight neural model for biomedical entity linking
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based implementation of a lightweight neural architecture for biomedical entity linking, designed to efficiently map mentions to knowledge base entities as presented at AAAI 2021.

tools.name: CollaboNet
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative network for biomedical named entity recognition
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for biomedical named entity recognition (NER) that utilizes collaborative learning strategies to improve the extraction of biomedical entities from text.

tools.name: Multi-BioNER
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-type biomedical NER with deep multi-task learning
tools.detailed_description: A deep multi-task learning model for biomedical named entity recognition that leverages cross-type information to enhance the identification of multiple biomedical entity categories simultaneously.
